short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Neon wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Neon background. Neon wallpaper background theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Neon wallpapers every time you open a new tab.
2. Choose a random Neon background or set your favorite in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google Search Bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media platforms.
5. Displays the current date and time.
6. Note feature for jotting down tasks.
7. Quick links to frequently visited websites.
8. Convenient access to bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel to add websites for swift access.
10. Instant access to Google applications.
11. Access additional themes easily.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. Quick access to Download wallpapers.
14. Quick links to games.
15. Activate interactive animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on the Neon new tab.
